logs.content:
I don’t have live web access in this chat, so I can’t actually “search” and fetch the latest quotes. If you enable browsing or share the current BTC-USD and gold spot (XAUUSD) prices, I’ll compute the comparison immediately (including the BTC-to-gold ratio: how many troy ounces per bitcoin).

If you want to grab them quickly yourself, here are simple commands:

- macOS/Linux (requires curl; jq optional)
  - Bitcoin (USD):
    curl -s 'https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price?ids=bitcoin&vs_currencies=usd'
  - Gold spot (USD per troy ounce):
    curl -s 'https://api.exchangerate.host/latest?base=XAU&symbols=USD'

- Windows PowerShell:
  - $btc = (Invoke-RestMethod 'https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price?ids=bitcoin&vs_currencies=usd').bitcoin.usd
  - $xau = (Invoke-RestMethod 'https://api.exchangerate.host/latest?base=XAU&symbols=USD').rates.USD
  - $ratio = [double]$btc / [double]$xau
  - "BTC: $($btc.ToString('C2')) | Gold: $($xau.ToString('C2'))/oz | 1 BTC = $($ratio.ToString('N2')) oz gold"

Or just tell me:
- BTC price in USD
- Gold spot in USD per troy ounce

I’ll then compare them and compute the BTC/XAU ratio for you.
